paper_abstract: In this article, a freeware tool for computer-aided design and analysis (resonant frequency and unloaded Q-factor) of dielectric resonators for antenna applications is presented. Several resonator shapes, including hemispherical, cylindrical, cylindrical ring, and rectangular cross-section, are supported. (c) 2009 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 20: 42-50, 2010.
paper_title: Computer-Aided Design and Analysis of Dielectric Resonator Antennas
